QuestData.Title: The Ancient Armor of the Kvaldir
QuestData.Description: I was on the vessel that was bringing in the armor. We'd just boarded the ship and were headin' back here when we were attacked by a Forsaken destroyer.$B$BThey boarded our ship, took all the booty for themselves, and then sunk her.$B$BThat was the last I'd seen of that armor. If you want, you can take my bomber from Scalawag to the dreaded isle that the destroyer be docked. Talk to my woman, Alanya, outside. She'll get you on the bomber.$B$BIf you manage to find the stuff, don't you dare bring it back!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Ancient Armor of the Kvaldir and deliver it to Orfus of Kamagua in the Howling Fjord.
QuestData.RewardText: We must return all of the artifacts, $n. When all four are gathered, you will put them back in their graves.
